snippet.title: Nitro Gen Omega Gameplay Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
A gameplay trailer for Nitro Gen Omega popped up during this year's Spring Showcase. It's a tactical RPG where you build a mech, fill it with mercenaries and engage in turn-based battles. This love letter to shonen anime is coming to PC in 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #nitrogenomega

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
